question_text: Which of the following best practices should be followed when working with modular power supplies? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Label cables before disconnecting for replacement
Use only cables that came with the specific PSU model
Always plug in all modular ports even if not needed
Mixing cables from different brands is usually safe
correct_answer: Label cables before disconnecting for replacement
Use only cables that came with the specific PSU model
explanation: Modular PSUs vary by brand and model. Mixing cables or skipping documentation may lead to voltage mismatch and hardware damage.
